name: Ironbound
description: Ironbound is a turn-based multiplayer strategy game with fast-paced duels and deep meta-game. Upgrade your character and equipment and climb to the top of the multiplayer ladder!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Pentium® D or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8 Series, ATI™ Radeon™ HD 2000 Series, Intel® HD Graphics 2000 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: not required
